Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
utils.Utilities
public class Utilities extends Object
Contains utility methods for various operations related to the game.

    • decodeCoordinates

      public static int[] decodeCoordinates(String coordinates)
      Decodes the string representation of coordinates into an array of integers.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The string representation of coordinates (e.g., "A1").
      Returns:
      An array of integers representing the decoded coordinates.
